title: Nevada issues emergency order requiring masks — vaccinated or not — in a dozen counties starting Friday
content:
1. Nevada issues emergency order requiring masks — vaccinated or not — in a dozen counties starting Friday  Reno Gazette Journal
  2. New mask mandate for Nevada  KTNV Channel 13 Las Vegas
  3. Sisolak reimposes indoor masking mandate in 12 counties including Carson, Douglas and Lyon  Nevada Appeal
  4. Nevada reinstates mask mandate in high-transmission areas, including Clark County  FOX5 Las Vegas
  5. Masks mandates to return to Washoe County  ThisisReno
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Nevada issues emergency order requiring masks — vaccinated or not — in a dozen counties starting Friday  Reno Gazette Journal
New mask mandate for Nevada  KTNV Channel 13 Las Vegas
Sisolak reimposes indoor masking mandate in 12 counties including Carson, Douglas and Lyon  Nevada Appeal
Nevada reinstates mask mandate in high-transmission areas, including Clark County  FOX5 Las Vegas
Masks mandates to return to Washoe County  ThisisReno

localize.title: ネバダ州、金曜日から12の郡で予防接種の有無にかかわらずマスク着用を義務付ける緊急命令を発令
内华达州发布紧急命令，要求从周五开始在十几个县戴口罩--无论是否接种疫苗
內華達州發佈緊急命令，要求從週五開始在十幾個縣戴口罩--無論是否接種疫苗
